name: Block Dash Ninja
description:
Super-fast, hyper-addictive and mega-exciting! It's the ultimate Block Dash puzzle competition! You'll need Ninja like reflexes to top the leaderboards in the award-winning Block Dash today! How high can you go?

Compete to match and make the biggest block chains as you can, use special abilities and level up to get huge score bonuses. Win great prizes and medals in the arcade competitions and crush your friends on the leaderboards!

Play the most addictive block match puzzle game for free today! Shop till you drop and buy amazing abilities, power-ups and items to become the Block Dash Facebook competition champion!

★WHY YOU'LL LOVE BLOCK DASH NINJA★
• GET FIRED UP!
Tune into your Ninja skills and reflexes to get those super high scores
Diamonds fall on the game board - be QUICK to catch them all!

• BE THE BEST
FB competitions and leaderboards! Crush your friends for great prizes and challenges

• PLAY ANYWHERE
Play on your mobile or tablet, and your leaderboards, friends and competition rank will stay in sync!

• AMAZING FUN
With special abilities and incredible boosts and unlocks, you'll get addicted from the first tap!

• REGULAR UPDATES WITH NEW FEATURES
Stay tuned for fast, exciting and challenging features.

The ultimate arcade block match puzzle game! Play for FREE now! How long can you last in the thrilling leaderboard challenges!
